title: 2 hurt in Roanoke shooting
content:
ROANOKE, Va. (WDBJ7) Two people were hurt in a shooting Tuesday in Roanoke.
The shooting happened around 11:45 a.m. Tuesday at the intersection of 13th Street and Jackson Avenue Southwest.
According to Roanoke Police, an adult male and a juvenile male were shot. Their injuries are not believed to be life-threatening.
No arrests have been made. Investigators have not released any information about a suspect.
